verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w myself|strong="G0846"\w* beseech \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* mildness \w and|strong="G2532"\w* modesty \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w presence|strong="G4383"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G0548"\w* \w lowly|strong="G5011"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w being|strong="G4771"\w* \w absent|strong="G0548"\w*, \w am|strong="G0548"\w* \w bold|strong="G2292"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* beseech \w you|strong="G3739"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w may|strong="G5100"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G5100"\w* \w bold|strong="G5111"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G5111"\w* \w present|strong="G3918"\w*, \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w confidence|strong="G4006"\w* wherewith \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G5111"\w* thought \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w be|strong="G5100"\w* \w bold|strong="G5111"\w*, \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* reckon \w us|strong="G1909"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w if|strong="G5613"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w walked|strong="G4043"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w though|strong="G1722"\w* we \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, we \w do|strong="G4043"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w war|strong="G4754"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w weapons|strong="G3696"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w warfare|strong="G4752"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* carnal, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w mighty|strong="G1415"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* pulling \w down|strong="G2507"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* fortifications, \w destroying|strong="G2507"\w* counsels,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w height|strong="G5313"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* exhalteth itself \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* bringing \w into|strong="G1519"\w* captivity \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w understanding|strong="G1108"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* readiness \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w revenge|strong="G1556"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w disobedience|strong="G3876"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w your|strong="G2192"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*.

\w See|strong="G0991"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w outward|strong="G2596"\w* \w appearance|strong="G4383"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w trust|strong="G3982"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w*, \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w think|strong="G3049"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w should|strong="G5100"\w* \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w somewhat|strong="G5100"\w* \w more|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w edification|strong="G3619"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w destruction|strong="G2506"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w should|strong="G5100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G0153"\w*.

\w But|strong="G3361"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w I|strong="G1223"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G3361"\w* \w thought|strong="G1380"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G1223"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w terrify|strong="G1629"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* epistles,

(\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* epistles \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w say|strong="G5346"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w*, \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w weighty|strong="G0926"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strong|strong="G2478"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* bodily \w presence|strong="G3952"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w weak|strong="G0772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w speech|strong="G3056"\w* \w contemptible|strong="G1848"\w*,)

\w Let|strong="G1510"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G3778"\w* \w think|strong="G3049"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w as|strong="G3049"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* epistles, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w absent|strong="G0548"\w*, \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w present|strong="G3778"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w dare|strong="G5111"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* match, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w compare|strong="G4793"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w*, \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w measure|strong="G3354"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w compare|strong="G4793"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w beyond|strong="G1519"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w measure|strong="G3358"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w rule|strong="G2583"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath measured \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w us|strong="G1519"\w*, \w a|strong="G3739"\w* \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w reach|strong="G2185"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* stretch \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w beyond|strong="G1519"\w* \w our|strong="G5547"\w* measure, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w if|strong="G5613"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w reached|strong="G1519"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w come|strong="G5348"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w far|strong="G0891"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w of|strong="G2098"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* glorying \w beyond|strong="G1519"\w* \w measure|strong="G0280"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w other|strong="G1161"\w* \w men’s|strong="G0245"\w* labours; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2192"\w* \w increasing|strong="G0837"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G2192"\w* \w magnified|strong="G3170"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w our|strong="G2596"\w* \w rule|strong="G2583"\w* abundantly;

Yea, unto \w those|strong="G3588"\w* places \w that|strong="G1722"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w beyond|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w preach|strong="G2097"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w another|strong="G0245"\w* \w man’s|strong="G0245"\w* \w rule|strong="G2583"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G1722"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* made \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w our|strong="G1722"\w* hand.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* glorieth, let \w him|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* commendeth \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w approved|strong="G1384"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* God commendeth.
